# How to import Map to Cisco CMX

To import maps using the GUI, perform the following tasks:

1  Log in to Cisco Mobile Connected Experiences (Cisco CMX).

2  Click SYSTEM Dashboard.
    
3  Click the Gear icon at the top-right corner of the window.

4  Click Controllers and Maps Setup Import.

Cisco CMX 10.2 provides an Override Maps option (SYSTEM > SETTINGS). 

By default, this option is enabled. When you enable this option, the Cisco CMX maps will be replaced with the maps defined in the file that you import.
